name: Evelyn Wu
title: Lead Materials Scientist
bio: Dr. Wu is a distinguished materials scientist specializing in surface modification and laser-material interactions. Her groundbreaking research has significantly advanced the understanding and application of laser cleaning techniques for sensitive materials. She holds a Ph.D. in Materials Engineering and has published extensively in peer-reviewed journals, contributing significantly to the field of sustainable industrial processes.

name: Mario Jordan
title: Senior Laser Applications Engineer
bio: Mario Jordan is a senior laser applications engineer with a focus on industrial implementation of laser cleaning systems. His practical expertise in optimizing laser parameters for various materials ensures real-world success for Z-Beam's clients. Mario is known for his problem-solving approach and ability to bridge theoretical science with practical engineering solutions in demanding industrial environments.

name: Todd Dunning
title: Laser Cleaning Expert
bio: Todd Dunning is a laser cleaning expert at Z-Beam, specializing in industrial applications for aerospace and manufacturing. With over 15 years of experience, he optimizes laser systems for scalability and efficiency.

name: Ikmanda Roswati
title: Laser Cleaning Expert
bio: Ikmanda is a laser cleaning expert, specializing in industrial applications for aerospace and manufacturing. With over 15 years of experience, he optimizes laser systems for scalability and efficiency.
